publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1246 Mr Bruce McFee: Johnstone High School Success-That the Parliament congratulates the team from Johnstone High School who were successful in the Scottish Schools Football Association Senior Shield Final, the oldest recognised schools football tournament in the world, and recognises their outstanding record of sporting achievement which now includes four Scottish cup wins in the last six years.
S2M-1246 Johnstone High School Success (lodged on 30 April 2004) Murray Tosh*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Des McNulty*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1246 Johnstone High School Success (lodged on 30 April 2004) Rob Gibson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-1246 Johnstone High School Success (lodged on 30 April 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-1246 Johnstone High School Success (lodged on 30 April 2004) Miss Annabel Goldie*
S2M-1246 Johnstone High School Success (lodged on 30 April 2004) Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1246 Johnstone High School Success (lodged on 30 April 2004) Frances Curran*
